name: Battling Viruses
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49.

In this submission to Ludum Dare, the player can control hordes of minions that fight their way through enemies towards the enemy base. But be wary - the minions might unexpectedly mutate some of their stats! 

Requiring you to adapt on the fly and change your strategy in the heat of the moment, this concept of a RTS replaces the PvP with the need to play around your own troops.
